website_summaries.verdict: The brand's experience in manufacturing some of the most favorite pairs in history allowed it to gain knowledge of what consumers like. The Footjoy Tour X puts the X factor on the course. It provides superior control, comfort, and stability, making it a tour-ready piece that both beginners and professionals can appreciate.
pros: Plenty of users call the Tour X a game-changer because of the utmost comfort that this shoe provides
Several reviewers instantly became fans of this Footjoy golf shoe
It delivers stability and support throughout the swing
The waterproof upper keeps the foot dry despite the worst conditions, says a handful of testers
Some of the wearers find the styling classic but hip
One feels ecstatic about this pair because it does not aggravate any existing foot problem
A couple of purchasers instantly feel how lightweight these trainers are
A few individuals find the wide spike pads an excellent feature because they grip the ground well
One particularly likes the pointy construction as it helps with foot alignment when addressing the ball
cons: One says that the high price point may put some people off

customer_reviews.title: Ankle killers
customer_reviews.text: I have always been the #1 fan of footjoy golf shoes over the years. They usually make great products. These shoes however are ankle killers. The elevated ankle support on the left shoe is covered with dried blood as it has rubbed the skin off in that area. As I have worn them a few times I doubt a return is possible. Looks like they are going on the shelf or in the trash. Real bummer!!
customer_reviews.author: jsto

customer_reviews.title: Footjoy Men’s Tour X golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband, who wears a 10 1/2 Extra Wide. They were too narrow... fit like a Medium Width. Had to return them. Footjoy Dry Joys fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: L. Friel

customer_reviews.title: Buy these
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and great grip. As always Foot Joy gets it right.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J Smith Jr

customer_reviews.title: Premium
customer_reviews.text: Best and most comfortable golf shoe I have purchased. I wasn’t sure it would be worth the premium price but it definitely is. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ModernMilitaryMan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but defective
customer_reviews.text: Received these shoes June 11th 2020, shoes are very sharp and feel very comfortable on the course. Noticed the last time I played the sole was starting to separate from threat of the shoe. Not only on the inside but outside is well. Hoping there is not an issue with returning the defective pair I got.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I was buying Addis but these are better glad I bought them
customer_reviews.author: Randal Garden

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and stability for sure.
customer_reviews.text: Fits just like a glove! Firm grip on the ground and superior comfort!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Most uncomfortable golf shoe ever purchased. Though it fitted well, every time i play golf it rips skin off my heel. After 10+ rounds they are still not broken in
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Woodhams

customer_reviews.title: Heel is a bit loose
customer_reviews.text: They were a little loose on my heel. I tried 10m, 9.5W, and 9W. All fit normally except the heel.
customer_reviews.author: Matt rickle

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Very solid pair of shoes. Great fit, and sporty aesthetics.
customer_reviews.author: Richard R Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Like butter
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes I ever bought. I wear them around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very stable - Quality not great
customer_reviews.text: The spike pattern and the design where the spikes go outside the sole is breakthrough. Very stable, you will notice this in your swing. The tongue design is poor. The fold over the top of the tongue material and it rubs on the top of your foot. This is annoying if you walk a lot like I do.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip W.

customer_reviews.title: Solid shoe
customer_reviews.text: Took about 50 miles to break in, they are comfortable and fit true to size. Good support and stability.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes. May Run Larger than Expected
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t worn them out of the course but with just wearing them around the house, they are very comfortable. Seem to be very well crafted and should last many years on the course. These do run large. I am always a size 8.5 but when I got them in they we’re definitely too big for my foot. Returned and got an 8 which fits perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Thompson

customer_reviews.title: For Spikes these are great.
customer_reviews.text: Great golf shoes. They run a half size large. Typically I would be a 10.5 Standard width on these I was a 10 Standard width.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie’s Dad

customer_reviews.title: Great golf shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These golf shoes are great , comfortable, good stability and the fit is spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Extra wide size not wide enough
customer_reviews.text: Not for wide feet. I need 4E widths; the extra wide size no where near 4E. Held them up against a 3E competitor shoe - not even 3E. Too bad - leather is comfy and appears to be a quality shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Footjoy Men's Tour X Golf Shoe
feature_bullets: Max stability - the tour x power Plate outsole provides an incredibly lightweight yet stable platform from which players efficiently transfer power throughout the golf swing

Max control - the tour x features fj’s proprietary power strap, a molded component integrated into the shoe's upper to provide lock-down medial and lateral support. 3D molded collar technology delivers a secure and precise fit round after round

Max comfort - the tour x utilizes an Ortholite Impressions fit-bed to ensure all-day underfoot comfort and fj's Exclusive premium performance Leather (ppl) to achieve top grade feel, finish, and waterproof protection
Waterproof - pure performance Leather ppl, offers outstanding waterproof comfort, breathability, and durability. Fj warrants that this golf shoe will be 100% Waterproof in normal use for two years

Laser plus fit - The laser plus last offers a full rounded toe character, standard fit across forefoot and instep, with a slightly narrow heel. Thicker insole provides increased underfoot cushioning for enhanced comfort
